alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:47PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Huerfano County through 215 PM MDT... At 147 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walsenburg, or 16 miles east of Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walsenburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
